title: 25 24 25 "Pearl Jam""The Deadly Foot Technique Bursts Forth! Sanji vs. The Invincible Pearl!"Transliteration: "Hissatsu Ashiwaza Sakuretsu! Sanji vs Teppeki no Pāru" (Japanese:必殺足技炸裂!サンジVS鉄壁のパール) Yuji Endo Mitsuri Shimada 513.7 May 17, 2000(2000-05-17)[47] March 12, 2005[48]
transformers_text:
25 24 25 "Pearl Jam""The Deadly Foot Technique Bursts Forth! Sanji vs. The Invincible Pearl!"Transliteration: "Hissatsu Ashiwaza Sakuretsu! Sanji vs Teppeki no Pāru" (Japanese:必殺足技炸裂!サンジVS鉄壁のパール) Yuji Endo Mitsuri Shimada 513.7 May 17, 2000(2000-05-17)[47] March 12, 2005[48]

Mihawk leaves after defeating Zoro, so Krieg continues his invasion. He has Pearl, one of his stronger crewmates, attack, and Sanji reveals his fighting skills with his kicking-based fighting style, gaining the upper hand on Pearl, but Ghin takes Zeff hostage.
